headline: Missed Out on Eli Lilly's 480% Gains Over the Past 5 Years? These GLP-1 Stocks Still Have Plenty of Upside.
summary: Eli Lilly shares have soared in value in recent years due to the success of its GLP-1 drugs.  Viking Therapeutics and Altimmune have exciting GLP-1 products entering phase 3 trials.  Eli Lilly (NYSE: LLY) has been one of the hottest healthcare stocks to own in recent years, thanks in large part to the success of its incredibly successful GLP-1 agonist drugs, which help patients with diabetes and weight loss.
